desc: This advanced piano class for B.M. music majors emphasizes sight playing, score reading, harmonization and transposition, more advanced harmonic idioms, improvisation, ensemble playing, and performance preparation. Students earning a grade of B- or higher meet the department's keyboard proficiency standards for B.M. instrumental performance majors. Prerequisite: Music 162, equivalency examination II, or audition placement.
name: Kybd Proficiency Skil
prerequisites: Prerequisite: Music 162, equivalency examination II, or audition placement.
title: Piano Class III
